body.name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO Series - 1TB PCIe Gen4. X4 NVMe 2.0c - M.2 Internal SSD (MZ-V9P1T0B/AM)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 15 hrs 27 mins
features: ADOBE MEMBERSHIP: Get a two-month membership of Adobe Creative Cloud Photography plan on us when you purchase and register an eligible 1TB or 2TB Samsung SSD*.Specific uses: Personal, gaming, Business

HUGE SPEED BOOST: Get random read/write speeds that are 40%/55% faster than 980 PRO; Experience up to 1400K/1550K IOPS, while sequential read/write speeds up to 7,450/6,900 MB/s reach near the max performance of PCIe 4.0*
BREAKTHROUGH POWER EFFICIENCY: Use less power and get more performance; Enjoy up to 50% improved performance per watt over 980 PRO, plus optimal power efficiency with max PCIe 4.0 performance**

SMART THERMAL CONTROL: Samsung's own nickel-coated controller delivers effective thermal control; With its slim size, 990 PRO is a perfect fit for desktops and laptops that meet the PCI-SIG D8 standard***
THE CHAMPION MAKER: Up to 65% improvement in random performance enables faster loads for an ultimate gaming experience on PS5 and DirectStorage PC games****

SAMSUNG MAGICIAN SOFTWARE: Get the most out of your SSD with Samsung Magician's advanced yet intuitive optimization tools; Monitor drive health, protect valuable data, and receive important updates for your 990 PRO

WORLD'S #1 FLASH MEMORY BRAND: Experience the performance and reliability from the world's #1 brand for flash memory since 2003; All firmware & components, including Samsung's world-renowned DRAM & NAND, are produced in-house*****
body.description: Reach max performance with PCIe® 4.0. Experience longer-lasting, opponent-blasting speed. The in-house controller's smart heat control delivers supreme power efficiency while maintaining ferocious performance that always keeps you at the top of your game.****** Designed for tech enthusiasts, hardcore gamers and heavy-workload professionals who want blazing fast speed. Sequential read/write speeds up to 7,450/6,900 MB/s. Experience the performance and reliability that you can only get from the world's number one brand**** for flash memory since 2003.*Sequential and random write performance was measured with Intelligent Turbo Write technology being activated. Intelligent Turbo Write operates only within a specific data transfer size. Performance may vary depending on SSD’s firmware, system hardware & configuration and other factors. For detailed information, please contact your local service center. Test system configuration: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X 8-Core Processor CPU@3.80GHz, DDR4 3600MHz 16GBx2 (PC4-25600 Overclock), OS - Windows 10 Pro 64bit, Chipset - ASRock-X570 Taichi. **980 PRO Sequential Read/Write - 1,129/877 MB/Watt, 990 PRO Sequential Read/Write - 1380/1319 MB/Watt based on internal test result of 1TB capacity model. ***PCI-SIG®D8 standard spec: 8.8mm. ****DirectStorage technology from Microsoft loads games faster than before by leveraging the multiple GB/sec speed of modern NVMe SSDs. Results are based on a comparison with Samsung 980 PRO. *****Source: 2003~2021 OMDIA data - NAND suppliers' revenue market share. ******PCIe 4.0’s best theoretical sequential read is 8000 MB/s - 990 PRO reaches 7,450 MB/s as of Q3, 2022.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Blazing Speed and Reliable Performance!
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my laptop with the Samsung SSD 990 Pro, and I'm absolutely thrilled with the results. This Gen 4 SSD offers lightning-fast speeds, which has been a game-changer for my heavy-duty software and gaming needs. The installation was a breeze, and it was immediately recognized by my system without any hiccups.The performance boost is instantly noticeable. Programs load in a flash, and data transfers are quicker than I've ever experienced. For gaming, it's a dream come true. Games that used to take a while to load are now up and running in seconds. The SSD maintains consistent performance even under load, which is crucial for gaming and resource-intensive tasks.What impressed me the most is how flawlessly this SSD has worked in my laptop. There have been no compatibility issues, no crashes, just smooth, efficient operation. Its reliability and efficiency have made my computing experience much more enjoyable and productive.Overall, I'm extremely satisfied with my purchase of the Samsung SSD 990 Pro. It's a perfect blend of speed, reliability, and performance. If you're considering an upgrade or need an SSD that can keep up with demanding applications and games, this is the one to get. Highly recommended!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stellar Performance and Speed
reviews.reviewText: I recently upgraded my storage solution to the Samsung 990 PRO Series - 1TB PCIe Gen4. X4, and I must say it has exceeded my expectations in terms of performance.The PCIe Gen4 interface delivers lightning-fast data transfer speeds, making this SSD an excellent choice for those who demand high-performance storage. Whether you're a gamer, content creator, or power user, the responsiveness of the Samsung 990 PRO Series is truly remarkable.The sequential read and write speeds are nothing short of impressive. Large files transfer seamlessly, and the overall system responsiveness is noticeably improved. The 1TB capacity provides ample space for storing games, applications, and multimedia files without compromising speed.One standout feature is the reliability of the Samsung 990 PRO Series. The drive utilizes advanced NAND technology and comes with a robust controller, ensuring durability and longevity. This makes it a reliable choice for both demanding workloads and everyday use.I also appreciate the heat dissipation design of this SSD. It manages temperature effectively, preventing any performance throttling during prolonged and intensive tasks. The build quality is top-notch, and the drive feels solid and well-constructed.The Samsung Magician software adds value to the overall package, offering users tools for monitoring, optimizing, and managing the SSD. Firmware updates are straightforward, and the user interface is intuitive.In conclusion, the Samsung 990 PRO Series - 1TB PCIe Gen4. X4 is a stellar performer. It combines impressive speed, reliability, and durability, making it an ideal choice for those who require high-performance storage. While it may come at a premium price, the performance gains are well worth the investment. I highly recommend this SSD for anyone looking to elevate their system's storage capabilities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top Choice for Gamers & Those Who Need Speed, Storage Capacity & Reliability!
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a fast, reliable, and spacious SSD for your PC, you should definitely consider the Samsung 990 pro 2TB PCIe Gen4. X4 NVMe 2.0c - M.2 Internal SSD. This SSD is one of the best in the market, offering blazing-fast performance, high durability, and low power consumption.The Samsung 990 pro 2TB SSD uses the PCIe Gen4. X4 interface, which delivers up to 7,000 MB/s of sequential read speed and up to 5,100 MB/s of sequential write speed. This means that you can transfer large files, load games, and boot your system in seconds. The SSD also supports the NVMe 2.0c protocol, which enables faster and more efficient communication between the SSD and the CPU.The Samsung 990 pro 2TB SSD is also built to last, with a total bytes written (TBW) rating of 1,200 TB. This means that you can write up to 1,200 TB of data to the SSD before it wears out, which is equivalent to writing 600 GB of data every day for 5 years. The SSD also has a mean time between failures (MTBF) rating of 1.5 million hours, which means that it has a very low probability of failing during its lifetime.The Samsung 990 pro 2TB SSD is also designed to consume less power than other SSDs, with an average power consumption of only 6 W. This means that you can save energy and extend the battery life of your laptop or mobile device. The SSD also has a dynamic thermal guard (DTG) feature, which monitors and adjusts the temperature of the SSD to prevent overheating and performance throttling.The Samsung 990 pro 2TB SSD is compatible with most PC systems that have an M.2 slot and support PCIe Gen4. X4 or lower. The SSD comes with a 5-year limited warranty, which covers any defects or malfunctions that occur during normal use. The SSD also comes with a Samsung Magician software, which allows you to monitor the health and performance of the SSD, update the firmware, optimize the system settings, and more.The Samsung 990 pro 2TB PCIe Gen4. X4 NVMe 2.0c - M.2 Internal SSD is a great choice for anyone who wants a fast, reliable, and spacious SSD for their PC. It offers outstanding performance, high durability, and low power consumption, making it one of the best SSDs in the market. I highly recommend this SSD to anyone who is looking for an upgrade or a new build.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very fair price for 4TB. Performs outstanding!
reviews.reviewText: Very fair price for 4TB. Performs outstanding!Was very easy to install.We instantly recognized by Windows and easy to configure.I do video editing and creation off this drive and it performs flawlessly and FAST!
excelente ssd tiene temperaturas estables con el disipador que traer ademas me da la velocidad exacta que dice el fabricante recomendado

Samsung 990pro comprado en buen fin del 2023, llevo pocos meses usandolo en el PS5 pero sin fallas hasta el momento.La consola no aumento el uso de ventilador ni se traba ni nada malo que reportar.Previo a instalar el SSD al PS5 lo conecte al PC para verificar si necesitaba actualización pero no lo requeria, ya traia la versión más nueva para nov 2023.Pongo fotito de la velocidad de prueba que hace la consola, el disipador lo compre aparte porque no incluye.El precio por el que adquiri este SSD de 4TB fue $5400 más la promo bancaria que habia en el buen fin.
Es increíblemente rápido perfecto para hacer un upgrade o tener como disco principal en un nuevo setup
O melhor SSD M2 Gen4 do mundo!

I recently upgraded my PC's storage with the SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 2TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 Internal Solid State Hard Drive, and the results have been nothing short of astounding!First and foremost, the speed of this SSD is jaw-dropping. With PCIe 4.0 support, it delivers lightning-fast read and write speeds that have significantly improved the overall performance of my system. Loading times are virtually nonexistent, and large files transfer in the blink of an eye. If you're looking for a drive to turbocharge your gaming or professional work, this is it.The 2TB capacity offers ample space for all my files, games, and applications. It's perfect for content creators, gamers, or anyone who needs high-speed storage with room to spare. Installation was a breeze thanks to its M.2 form factor, and the included software makes migration painless.The build quality is top-notch, as expected from Samsung. The drive runs cool and quiet, even under heavy workloads. Plus, Samsung's reputation for reliability gives me peace of mind knowing my data is safe.While it may be on the higher end of the price spectrum, the performance gains are well worth the investment. If you're serious about speed and storage, the SAMSUNG 990 PRO SSD 2TB PCIe 4.0 M.2 is the SSD to get. I couldn't be happier with my purchase!
